casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Wheeler, Appellee, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio et al.; Metro Electric, Inc., Appellant.

[Cite as State ex rel. Wheeler v. Indus. Comm. (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 394.]

(No. 97-2477 Submitted August 19, 1998 Decided October 14, 1998.) Harris & Burgin, L.P.A., and Andrea L. Bums, for appellee. Brickler & Eckler, L.L.P., Charles D. Smith and Nelson M. Reid, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. Pfeifer and Cook, JJ., dissent.
